temporal_queries.question: Is the Protocol active on 2096-07-01?

expected.reason: The Protocol is effective 45 days after Presidential Certification, and certification has not occurred, so it is not yet active on 2096-07-01.

temporal_queries.question: When does the Protocol become effective if Presidential Certification is issued on 2096-08-01?

expected.reason: The Protocol becomes effective 45 days after Presidential Certification on 2096-08-01, which is 2096-09-15.

temporal_queries.question: When is full compliance with the Protocol required if Presidential Certification is issued on 2096-08-01?

expected.reason: Full compliance is required within 30 days of the Protocol’s effective date, which is 45 days after certification; 45 + 30 = 75 days after 2096-08-01.

temporal_queries.question: Is Topic 12 active on 2096-12-31 if Presidential Certification has not occurred?

expected.reason: Topic 12 is effective upon Presidential Certification; with no certification date, it remains pending and inactive.

temporal_queries.question: When does Topic 12 become effective if Presidential Certification is issued on 2096-10-10?

expected.reason: Topic 12 becomes effective upon Presidential Certification, so its effective date equals the certification date.

temporal_queries.question: When does Topic 22 become effective if Presidential Certification is issued on 2096-10-10?

expected.reason: Topic 22 is effective 45 days after Topic 12 takes effect; Topic 12 is effective on 2096-10-10, so Topic 22 becomes effective on 2096-11-24.

temporal_queries.question: What is the effective date of Topic 22 if Presidential Certification has not occurred?

expected.reason: Topic 22 depends on Topic 12, which depends on Presidential Certification. With no certification date, Topic 22 has no computable effective date and remains pending.

temporal_queries.question: Is Topic 22 active on 2097-01-01 if Presidential Certification has not occurred?

expected.reason: Because Presidential Certification has not occurred, Topic 12 and Topic 22 never become effective; Topic 22 is not active on 2097-01-01.

temporal_queries.question: What is the deadline for filing Form ZC-Q if the quarter ends on 2096-09-30?

expected.reason: Quarterly Zone-C Reports must be filed within 30 days of quarter end; 30 days after 2096-09-30 is 2096-10-30.

temporal_queries.question: What is the deadline for updating Form ADV-ZC after a material change on 2096-04-01?

expected.reason: Registrations must be updated within 30 days of material changes; 30 days after 2096-04-01 is 2096-05-01.

temporal_queries.question: On what date is the annual Zone-C Advisor registration renewal due each year?

expected.reason: Zone-C registrations expire annually on June 30, so renewal is due on June 30 every year.

temporal_queries.question: Are monthly account statements required as of the Protocol’s effective date?

expected.reason: Monthly statements are an ongoing obligation in the custody section and become binding once the Protocol is effective.

temporal_queries.question: Is a Zone-C Advisor required to file an event report for a qualifying incident occurring on 2096-03-10, and what is the timing requirement?

expected.reason: Event Reporting requires immediate reporting for specified incidents; a qualifying incident on 2096-03-10 must be reported without delay.

temporal_queries.question: Until what date must Zone-C records be retained for a record created on 2096-01-01?

expected.reason: Zone-C records must be retained for at least 10 years; a record dated 2096-01-01 must be kept until 2106-01-01.

temporal_queries.question: When does Benefit X status terminate if an investor’s Zone-C asset levels fall below the threshold starting on 2096-05-01 and remain below for six consecutive months?

expected.reason: Benefit X terminates if asset levels fall below the threshold for 6 consecutive months; six months after 2096-05-01 is 2096-11-01.

temporal_queries.question: If Presidential Certification is issued on 2096-08-01, by what date must investors claiming Benefit X file supplemental reports required within 45 days of certification?

expected.reason: Benefit X investors must file supplemental reports within 45 days of Presidential Certification; 45 days after 2096-08-01 is 2096-09-15.

temporal_queries.question: On which dates are quarterly Form ZC-Q reports due for a firm with standard calendar quarters ending 03-31, 06-30, 09-30, and 12-31 in 2096?

expected.reason: Each Form ZC-Q is due within 30 days of quarter end for Q1, Q2, Q3, and Q4 respectively.

temporal_queries.question: From what date do late filing penalties begin to accrue if a required filing is due on 2096-06-15 and submitted on 2096-06-20?

expected.reason: Late penalties begin accruing the day after the deadline; a filing due 2096-06-15 but submitted 2096-06-20 is 5 days late starting 2096-06-16.

temporal_queries.question: If Presidential Certification is never issued, when does the Protocol’s pending status end?

expected.reason: The effective date is defined relative to Presidential Certification. If certification never occurs, the Protocol remains in pending status with no effective date.

temporal_queries.question: Is Topic 22 ever active if Presidential Certification is never issued?

expected.reason: Topic 22 depends on Topic 12, which is effective only upon Presidential Certification. Without certification, Topic 22 never becomes active.
